formatted_address: 80 Jurong East Street 21, #04-06 Devan Nair Institute, Singapore 609607
name: Academy of Sports and Exercise Science

reviews.text: Very glad to have found ASES! Coyie was great in getting me ready for my ACE course in Jan this year. The lecturer for the course is very experienced and knowledgeable, she is able to create a very conducive learning environment - blended learning practical and theory course work that helps all of us better absorb some of the more complex modules. I find it quite unique that ACE is also able to create a nice community amongst our batch mates even post training course. Highly recommended if anyone wants to check out ACE PT course!

Chief instructor Jane Wong was very clear and very good at showing the various exercises. We went over them many times and felt quite secure in performing pcr/aed. Also Jason was very calm and clear in his instructions. Great course

Enrolled in the ACE CPT program. The course was well conducted over approx a month. Instructors were very knowledgeable and shared plenty of practical tips contextualized to the local context. Course coordinators were very helpful in facilitating the classes. Highly recommended!
Chief instructor Jane was amazing. She taught us so well and so clearly. She made the whole day very fun. It is so useful to learn CPR, how to use AED and first aid. Thank you Jane, Jason and ASES!

I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt appreciation for Coyie outstanding professionalism in organizing the course. Her attention to detail and dedication truly made a difference in the overall experience.

Additionally, I am grateful for her kind and swift responses to any inquiries I had. Her support made the process seamless and enjoyable, and it did not go unnoticed.

It has been a pleasure being part of the course!üòÅ

vicinity: 80 Jurong East Street 21, #04-06 Devan Nair Institute
